title: Hungarian cookbook calligraphic serif
content:
Good morning,

please help me identify this typeface from a cookbook from Hungary (printed within the last decade, I haven't got an exact date unfortunately).

I feel I should be able to recognize this but it just eludes me. Thank you in advance for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [horvathilona.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820081940/http:/typophile.com/files/horvathilona.jpg) | 13.58 KB |
author: Atwe

comments.content:
Thank you a lot, Andreas.

Works surprisingly well as body text.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
